overview: Have you checked your jewels lately? Are they prepared for a HARD STEAL? Director John Travis, A.V.N.'s Best Director 1989 for "Undercover," teams up with Image Studios and ready-man super model Rod Phillips in a jewel-grabbing mystery of Hot Rocks with Hard Cocks. Hard Steal takes you on the hard-pounding, all-male trail of felony fantasy. The cop-and-robbers cumfest has the horny hunks you need when the family jewels are up for grabs and aching...Aching for a HARD STEAL.
title: Hard Steal
